column2: Job description  Assist the Security Officer in developing, implementing, and enforcing  security policies, procedures, and protocols to safeguard company assets  and personnel.    Conduct regular patrols of the premises  to monitor for suspicious activity, unauthorized access, and safety  hazards, and take appropriate action to address any security concerns.   Monitor security cameras and alarm systems to identify and respond to  security breaches, emergencies, or incidents in a timely and effective  manner.  Provide access control and visitor management  services, including verifying identification, issuing badges or  credentials, and escorting authorized personnel as needed.   Conduct security screenings, bag checks, and vehicle inspections to  prevent the entry of prohibited items or unauthorized individuals into  the facility.  Respond to alarms, disturbances, or  emergencies, such as fire alarms, medical emergencies, or security  breaches, and coordinate with emergency responders as needed.
